Welcome to my site

Hi! I'm Leo, welcome to my site. It's been primarilly been built as a brochure site so that I can practice coding. It's been built using a combination the following tools:

  • Framework: HTML, CSS
  • Templating: Nunjucks
  • Runtime: Node
  • Compilation: Eleventy
